channel.title: SethScape 508 Project
channel.description:
[size=18pt]LATEST UPDATE: In-Game Lottery[/size]
Hello, im Seth owner of SethScape. I'm here to let you guys know about a project i am currently developing. I will format my development in an orderly conduct.
Base: I created my own base i will show a video explaining this later on.
Type: 508
Developers: Seth
I am currently working on an army system for my server, you will need to apply to be in the army you get an army uniform and depending on what rank you are you get a weapon (EX: Privates get a bronze dagger (this is not what i plan on doing but im still deciding how to promote this type of system but this is just an accumelation of what im doing.)
The Army Ranks: (Lowest to Highest)
Private, Corporal, Sergeant, Warrant Officer, Lieutenant, Captain, Major, Colonel, Brigadier, General.
CURRENTLY WORKING ON: In-Game Lottery
What i plan on doing with SethScape: I plan on creating a very stable runescape like server, so far ive created over 6 fully functional quests which are listed on top. I plan on doing much more ive got all skills working, but i plan on redoing all skills to perfection... i will be posting videos heres one video to savour your attention.
VIDEOS
UPDATED: TOUR! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LHuq8zuOnVA
QUESTS http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0UimkQsIa_A
THE ARMY http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zHuJwoqNBlg
THE ARMY UPDATED! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cu9rtN_2-4o
BLACK MARKS SYSTEM http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t499Y0GPMsU
The Army Updates LATEST http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=La0WZngz6-k
My goal is to redo all the current skills and make them more runescape like, all npcs walking and talking, a server where you can basically do anything you can do in runescape! thats my long term goal, for example if you want to milk a cow or shear a sheep just for the hell of it you will be able to do so! i guess you guys catch my drift so far theres many features to my server... so watch the videos and enjoy!
Yours Respectfully, Seth

item.title: SethScape 508 Project
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

SethScape 508:

thanks, and kane now you see why i needed help on the “private:” thing because i needed it to save what rank you are, now i added all ranks and it saves perfectly! Im basically finished the whole layout of the army system, ive already created the ranks, all i need to do is create the special features you get when in the army and what rank you are… and kane thanks again for telling me what substring meant. it helped sooo much on this project!

Np dude.

Read full topic
